item.title: HIDS Monitoring Made Easy
item.description: Author’s Note This Blog, let alone this blog post, has been something I’ve been meaning to get off the ground for quite some time. Because of this, I will attempt to curb my extreme enthusiasm as I attempt to write a meaningful post on one of my favorite technologies, HIDS. I hope you all enjoy the blog, and please, if you have questions or want me to talk/elaborate on a specific technology please email me at adbouhmad@gmail.

item.title: About the Author
item.description: Adam Bouhmad is a Security Engineer at a Fortune 1000 company.
